naslov: PRODAJA - UREĐENA I NAMJEŠTENA KUĆA S BAZENOM - BENKOVAC, PODLUG (prodaja)
Mogućnost zamjene: Nije moguća zamjena za drugu nekretninu
opis: PRODAJA - UREĐENA KUĆA S BAZENOM - BENKOVAC, PODLUG Prodajemo potpuno namještenu, novo uređenu samostojeću kuću u mjestu Podlug. Od Benkovca, velikih trgovina i ostalog sadržaja udaljena je 9min vožnje. Od Biograda na moru i Pakoštana udaljena je 17km, od Vranskog jezera 12km. Zračna luka Zadar udaljena je 30km. U blizini od 50km nalaze se izletišta poput  NP Krka, Tulove grede te Zadar, Šibenik, Vodice, NP Paklenica, Zrmanja.. Kuća ukupne površine od 216m2, sastoji se od prizemlja i kata. U prizemlju se nalazi dnevni boravak s kuhinjom i blagovaonicom i kupaonica. Iz dnevnog boravka je izlaz na prostranu natkrivenu terasu s roštiljem s pogledom na uređenu, ograđenu, veliku okućnicu s bazenom. Na katu su 3 spavaće sobe, kupaonica i još jedna soba/dnevni boravak  gdje su pripremljene instalacije za kuhinju i samostalnu jedinicu. Kući pripada i parking sa 6 parkirnih mjesta. Odlična prilika i za korištenje za najam, u turističke svrhe. Vlasništvo 1/1, papiri uredni! Bonus nekretnine d.o.o. Osredak 4, Zagreb Federica Grisogona, Zadar FOR SALE - FULLY RENOVATED HOUSE WITH POOL - BENKOVAC, PODLUG We are selling a fully furnished, newly renovated house in the village of Podlug. It is located just  9 min driving distance from Benkovac, major shops, and other important facilities. The property is 17 km from Biograd na Moru and Pakoštane, and 12 km from Lake Vrana. Zadar Airport is 30 km away. Within a 50 km radius, you will find popular tourist spots such as Krka National Park, Tulove Grede, as well as the cities of Zadar, Šibenik, Vodice, Paklenica National Park, and the Zrmanja River. The house has a total area of 216 m² and consists of a ground floor and first floor. On the ground floor, there is a living room with a kitchen and dining area, and a bathroom. From the living room, you can access a spacious covered terrace with a barbecue, offering a view of the well-maintained, fenced yard with the pool. Upstairs, there are 3 bedrooms, a bathroom, and an additional room/lounge where the installations for a kitchen have been prepared, allowing it to be turned into a self-contained unit. The property also includes a parking area with 6 parking spaces. The house is a great opportunity for rental use, for tourism purposes. Ownership 1/1, all documents in order! Bonus nekretnine d.o.o. Osredak 4, Zagreb Federica Grisogona, Zadar
